articles.title: Vijay Mallya gets four-month jail term, Rs 2,000 fine in Supreme Court contempt case
articles.description: The top court had in 2020 dismissed Mallya’s plea seeking review of the 2017 verdict, which held him guilty of contempt for transferring $40 million to his children in violation of court orders.

articles.title: India Likely To Surpass China As Most Populous Country In 2023: UN Report
articles.description: India is projected to surpass China as the world's most populous country next year, according to a report by the United Nations on Monday which said that the world population is forecast to reach eight billion by mid-November 2022.
articles.content:
World Population Day 2022: India is projected to have a population of 1.668 billion in 2050.
